result.title: How to find the next greater element on array
result.content:
Hello guys.

I was trying to solve this problem by Just Contest 2.0, about to find the next greater element. For exemple:

Array = [1, 5, 4, 7, 9]

Ans = [5, 7, 7, 9, -1]

-The input is 105.

My solution:

Solution
  1. array and starts all your positions equal -1;
  2. go to left to right in input array verifying if(v[i+1] > v[i]) then ans[i] = v[i+1];
  3. else if(ans[i+1] > v[i]) then ans[i] = ans[i+1];
  4. otherwise ans[i] = -1.

My implementation:

Implementation
int main(){
	int n;
	while(scanf("%d", &n) != EOF){
		int v[n], ans[n];
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			scanf("%d", &v[i]);
		memset(ans, -1, sizeof ans);
		for(int i = n-2; i >= 0; i--){
			if(v[i+1] > v[i])
				ans[i] = v[i+1];
			else if(ans[i+1] > v[i])
				ans[i] = ans[i+1];
		}
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			printf("%d%s", ans[i], i+1 == n ? "\n" : " ");
	}
	return 0;
}

Someone can explain-me where I did wrong? Or my idea is not correct?

Thaks!
